authentication.#: Authenticates user by password using sha256 hash and specified salt for password sha256(salt + password)
authentication.name: u1

authentication.#: Handles all users that login without username / password
authentication.name: anonymous

authentication.#: Handles all users that are not authenticated (non-existing user, invalid password)
authentication.name: unauthenticated

groups.#: Users can be combined into groups, group name starts with @
groups.name: @g1
